channel.title: Barbarian course?

item.title: Barbarian course?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

case 2282: //ropeswing if (c.barbObsticle == 0 && c.playerLevel[16] >= 30) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2551, 3549, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(122, c.playerAgility); c.barbObsticle = 1; } else if (c.playerLevel[16] >= 30) { c.getPA().movePlayer(2551, 3549, 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP(1200, c.playerAgility); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 30 Agility to attempt this obstacle"); } break;

PI Base

What am I missing? Every other part of the course works but that.

Before somebody says it yes I have the int in player.java.

Read full topic
